instructions_html:
For each sentence below do one of the following:
  • If the sentence contains text that belongs to one of the categories, highlight the text and map it to corresponding category.
    • The categories to be identified are Person, Organization and Location.
    • Tags in a sentence are differentiated by color code.
    • User can delete/modify a created tag.
  • If a sentence do not contain any enity, check " No entity found in sentence".
description: Classify words in the sentences below.
title: Name Entity Recognition
keywords: classification, categorization, person, organization, location, name entity recognition

hit_sentences.sentence: Your results have been submitted to Aisoftware Research and will be approved or rejected shortly.
